about_the_game:
Klaudia's swimsuit costume "Elegant Mermaid" is added.
Costumes can be changed by selecting "Changing Room" from the diary found on either the desk in Ryza's room or the desk in her atelier.

Note: This product is included in the Season Pass. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
